spEffectId0.Wiki: Enter the ID created with the special effects parameter

spEffectId1.Wiki: Enter the ID created with the special effects parameter

spEffectId2.Wiki: Enter the ID created with the special effects parameter

spEffectId3.Wiki: Enter the ID created with the special effects parameter

spEffectId4.Wiki: Enter the ID created with the special effects parameter

hit0_DmyPoly2.Wiki: The position of another point on the capsule Damipoli. -1 makes it a sphere

hit1_DmyPoly2.Wiki: The position of another point on the capsule Damipoli. -1 makes it a sphere

hit2_DmyPoly2.Wiki: The position of another point on the capsule Damipoli. -1 makes it a sphere

hit3_DmyPoly2.Wiki: The position of another point on the capsule Damipoli. -1 makes it a sphere

atkPhysCorrection.Wiki: PC only. Multiplier by multiplying the basic physical attack power

atkMagCorrection.Wiki: PC only. Multiply the magic attack power (in the case of a bow, correct the missile)

atkFireCorrection.Wiki: PC only. Multiply the fire attack power (in the case of a bow, correct the missile)

atkThunCorrection.Wiki: PC only. Multiplier for electric shock attack power (in the case of a bow, correct the missile)

atkStamCorrection.Wiki: PC only. Multiplier for stamina attack power

guardBreakCorrection.Wiki: PC only. Multiplying the base value by the repelling of the attack

atkThrowEscapeCorrection.Wiki: Weapon correction value for throw-through attacks

atkPhys.Wiki: NPCs only. Basic damage of physical attack

atkMag.Wiki: NPCs only. Additional damage from magic attacks

atkFire.Wiki: NPCs only. Additional damage from fire attacks

atkThun.Wiki: NPCs only. Additional damage from electric shock attacks

atkStam.Wiki: NPCs only. Amount of damage to enemy (player) stamina

guardBreakRate.Wiki: NPCs only. Value used to determine if an attack is repelled

isEnableCalcDamageForBushesObj.AltName: Is Considered Special Attack for Asset Destruction
isEnableCalcDamageForBushesObj.Wiki: Do you want to calculate damage for assets that are Break due to bush damage? To set. : Calculate, : Do not calculate (that is, you cannot inflict damage) [GR] SEQ20617

guardStaminaCutRate.Wiki: Correct the [stamina cut rate when guarding] set in the weapon parameter and NPC parameter.

guardRate.Wiki: NPC, the guard performance set in the weapon parameter is uniformly corrected. 0, 1x / 100, 2x / -100, guard multiplier = (guard multiplier / 100) to increase / decrease the parameter to 0. + 1)

throwTypeId.Wiki: ID associated with the throw parameter

hti0_Priority.Wiki: priority. If there are two or more hits at the same time, the one with the higher priority will be adopted.

hti1_Priority.Wiki: priority. If there are two or more hits at the same time, the one with the higher priority will be adopted.

hti2_Priority.Wiki: priority. If there are two or more hits at the same time, the one with the higher priority will be adopted.

hti3_Priority.Wiki: priority. If there are two or more hits at the same time, the one with the higher priority will be adopted.

dmgLevel.Wiki: Which damage motion should be played against the enemy when attacking? To decide.

mapHitType.Wiki: Which map do you see around the attack? The set

guardCutCancelRate.Wiki: Guard cut rate invalidation ratio (-100 to 100) Normal at 0 / Completely invalidated at -100 / Doubles the defense effect of the opponent at 100 -50, 100% cut shield becomes 50% cut Become

atkAttribute.Wiki: Physical attributes to set for attacks

spAttribute.Wiki: Special attributes to set for attacks

atkType.Wiki: Specify SFX / SE at the time of attack (1 set by attribute, material, size)

atkMaterial.Wiki: Specify SFX / SE at the time of attack (1 set by attribute, material, size)

hitSourceType.Wiki: Where do you get the Damipoli ID per attack? To specify

disableGuard.Wiki: If 1, ignore the guard on the guard side and enter the damage level

disableStaminaAttack.Wiki: Destruction judgment is performed by stamina attack power, but stamina is not actually reduced.

disableHitSpEffect.Wiki: Disables special effects when an attack hits. SCE bug countermeasures

IgnoreNotifyMissSwingForAI.AltName: Disable Missed Attack Notification For AI
IgnoreNotifyMissSwingForAI.Wiki: Do not notify AI of missed swing

repeatHitSfx.Wiki: Enemy only: Does SFX occur continuously when hitting a wall?

isDisableNoDamage.Wiki: Ignore invincible effects such as steps, TAE's complete invincibility cannot be ignored.

isCheckDoorPenetration.Wiki: Whether to check the door penetration. In the case of , it is judged whether or not the target through the door can be attacked.

isVsRideAtk.Wiki: If you hit the target of the riding special attack while riding, the SA damage will be multiplied by the multiplier.

isAddBaseAtk.Wiki: Do you refer to the additional attack power even in weapon attacks?

excludeThreatLvNotify.AltName: Is Excluded from Threat Level Notification
excludeThreatLvNotify.Wiki: Is it excluded from threat level notification?

atkBehaviorId.Wiki: Behavior identification value: Extra large damage transition

atkSuperArmor.Wiki: NPCs only. Value used for SA break calculation formula

AppearAiSoundId.Wiki: ID of AI sound generated when an attack occurs

HitAiSoundId.Wiki: ID of AI sound generated at the time of hit

HitRumbleId.Wiki: Vibration ID at the time of hit (-1 invalid). It is a vibration ID when none of the following three applies

HitRumbleIdByNormal.Wiki: Vibration ID at the time of hit when hitting the tip (-1 invalid)

HitRumbleIdByMiddle.Wiki: Vibration ID at the time of hit when hit in the middle (-1 invalid)

HitRumbleIdByRoot.Wiki: Vibration ID at the time of hit when hitting the root (-1 invalid)

traceDmyIdHead0.AltName: Trace SFX ID [0] - Head Dummy Poly
traceDmyIdHead0.Wiki: Sword flash root Damipoli ID_0 (-1 invalid)

traceDmyIdTail0.AltName: Trace SFX ID [0] - Tail Dummy Poly
traceDmyIdTail0.Wiki: Sword Flash Sword Tip Damipoli ID_0

atkDarkCorrection.Wiki: PC only. Multiply the dark attack power (in the case of a bow, correct the missile)

atkDark.Wiki: NPCs only. Additional damage from dark attacks

isDisableParry.Wiki: This is a flag to disable the new parry control. A process that determines that the damage on the attacking side has been parried when it comes into contact with a character in the parry state on the defending side.

isDisableBothHandsAtkBonus.Wiki: Avoid using the 1.5x growth status adaptation with both hands

isInvalidatedByNoDamageInAir.AltName: Is Invalidated by No Damage in Air
isInvalidatedByNoDamageInAir.Wiki: If Do you want to penetrate invincibility is , this setting will be ignored.

dmgLevel_vsPlayer.Wiki: Damage level to the player. If it is 0 (default), it is not used. The meaning of the range other than 0 (default) is the same as Damage level.

statusAilmentAtkPowerCorrectRate.Wiki: Magnification correction is performed for the abnormal state attack power of special effects.

spEffectAtkPowerCorrectRate_byPoint.Wiki: Magnification correction is performed for the special effect ~ ~ attack power [point].

spEffectAtkPowerCorrectRate_byRate.Wiki: Magnification is corrected for the special effect's attack power multiplier.

spEffectAtkPowerCorrectRate_byDmg.Wiki: Attack side of special effect: ~ ~ Performs magnification correction for damage multiplier.

atkBehaviorId_2.Wiki: Behavior identification value: Plays damage motion only at specific times

throwDamageAttribute.Wiki: Attribute of throw damage of attack judgment. Corresponding special effects will be applied. It works only when the attack ATK_PATAM_THROWFLAG_TYPE is 2: Throw.

statusAilmentAtkPowerCorrectRate_byPoint.Wiki: Magnification correction is performed for the special effect Whether to apply the abnormal state attack power magnification correction.

overwriteAttackElementCorrectId.Wiki: For overwriting the ID of the parameter that corrects the attack attribute

spAttributeVariationValue.Wiki: Value for giving variation to SFX and SE generated by special attribute in combination with special attribute (SEQ16473)

parryForwardOffset.Wiki: Front angle offset of [collapsed side] of parry establishment condition

atkSuperArmorCorrection.Wiki: PC only. Correction value to be applied to the [basic value] set for the weapon

defSfxMaterialVariationValue.Wiki: A value to have variations of damage SFX and SE in combination with defense material 1 or 2 used when guarding. (SEQ16473)

Self.Wiki: Governs hitboxes and damage of attacks
